description: The stock can be made weeks ahead; so can the gravy itself The golden turkey fat from the roasting pan is reserved and forms the base for a rich roux The finished gravy freezes beautifully and only needs to be whisked in a hot pan and tasted for salt and pepper before serving.
title: Turkey Gravy From Scratch
title_page: Turkey Gravy From Scratch Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
The stock can be made weeks ahead; so can the gravy itself. The golden turkey fat from the roasting pan is reserved and forms the base for a rich roux. The finished gravy freezes beautifully and only needs to be whisked in a hot pan and tasted for salt and pepper before serving.
Featured in: Flavorful Gravy Makes Thanksgiving.
